# ExESS API -- Global Structured Grids - Equatorial Symmetry

Global, structured, equatorial symmetric grids are implemented in `ExESS` as [`GlobalStructuredGrid_EqSim`](/api/grids/global_structured_2d_grids.qmd).

For utility functions, see: `areas`, `coords`, `coord2idx`, `surfacecoords`, and `volumes`.

:::
